final_cvs_morph.title: Final CVS morph
final_cvs_morph.description: The final morph that combines correspondences recovered in all registration steps.

final_cvs_morphed_norm.title: Final CVS morphed norm
final_cvs_morphed_norm.description: The CVS morphed norm.mgz file; final result of CVS with all registration steps contributions.

final_cvs_morphed_aseg.title: Final CVS morphed aseg
final_cvs_morphed_aseg.description: The CVS morphed aseg.mgz file with all registration steps contributions.

step1_morphed_aseg.title: Step 1 morphed aseg
step1_morphed_aseg.description: Morphed aseg.mgz file result of CVS up to step (3)(i) and contains elatic morph and aseg-based nonlinear registration.

step1_morphed_norm.title: Step 1 morphed norm
step1_morphed_norm.description: Morphed norm.mgz file result of CVS up to step (3)(i) and contains elatic morph and aseg-based nonlinear registration.
